channel.title: I get a error in runserver.bat
channel.description:
'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.:
This is my code:::::
@echo off title Compiling... color f0
echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo / \ echo / Now compiling server... \ echo / \ echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
javac -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java title Tottyscape color f0
echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo / \ echo / Now starting server... \ echo / \ echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./Class; server pause
:confused: :confused: :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :mad: :mad: :mad: :confused: :confused: :confused

item.title: I get a error in runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @rockon764 rockon764
item.description:
@rockon764 wrote:

‘javac’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.:

This is my code:::::

@echo off
title Compiling…
color f0

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now compiling server…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

javac -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java
title Tottyscape
color f0

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now starting server…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

java -Xmx512m -cp .;./Class; server
pause

:mad: :mad: :mad: :confused
